about_the_game:
There is a fine line between dream and nightmare...

Very Bad Dreams is an intense and demanding experience that will test your nerves.

Forget everything you thought you knew about horror games, because Very Bad Dreams transcends the boundaries of the gaming experience. Developed by an independent French studio, Very Bad Dreams is much more than just a game. It is an extraordinary immersive experience, where your survival depends on real actions. You will need to react instinctively to survive this scary world.

Feel the impacts of your strike force, feel vibrations in your head when you are hit by an enemy or your heart races, run and jump using your real gestures, hold your head with both hands so as not to become mad.

So many new gameplay elements that will give you the impression of never doing the same thing.

Do you like looking for endless loot? Try hundreds of weapon and potion combinations? Spend hours in your inventory ?

Very Bad Dreams is not for you... Here only one word of warning, be afraid... very afraid, whether you have a gun, a bat or a knife the best thing is to flee and NOT fall into madness.

The “Very Bad Dreams” demo contains 3 chapters of the game and reveals different types of gameplay.

Please note that this demo does not include the full tutorial, so we can concentrate on the essentials. The full version is much more extensive and detailed than this one.

If that doesn't frighten you, then “Very Bad Dreams” is for you!

Lead the fight for your existence in an atmosphere where madness is palpable and anxiety grows with every step you take, face hordes of zombies, solve puzzles or search for the best place to hide.

For the bravest among you, prepare to live an extraordinary immersive experience, where horror comes to life and where every moment can seal your fate.

Face your inner demons, triumph over your deepest fears. But remember, never, ever succumb to madness

Do you dare to dive into the endless abyss of Very Bad Dreams?

We will have warned you...

  • Very Bad Dreams was tested with VR headsets "Meta Quest 2", "Meta Quest 3", "Meta Quest 3s", "Oculus Rift", "Oculus Rift S".

content_descriptors.notes:
- The game contains scenes mentioning tobacco and alcohol.
- The game contains gore scenes with lots of blood.
- The game contains scenes with insects that may offend phobics (Spiders, Cockroaches, etc.)
